stmt.ORACLE: BEGIN insert into "EMPLOYEES" ( FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,EMAIL,PHONE_NUMBER,HIRE_DATE,JOB_ID,SALARY,COMMISSION_PCT,MANAGER_ID,DEPARTMENT_ID,CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_USER,LOCATION_ID,COUNTRY_ID,DEPARTMENT_NAME,JOB_TITLE,CITY,STATE_PROVINCE,COUNTRY_NAME,REGION_NAME,MANAGER_NAME) values (:FIRST_NAME,:LAST_NAME,:EMAIL,:PHONE_NUMBER,:HIRE_DATE,:JOB_ID,:SALARY,:COMMISSION_PCT,:MANAGER_ID,:DEPARTMENT_ID,:CREATE_DATE,:UPDATE_DATE,:CREATE_USER,:UPDATE_USER,:LOCATION_ID,:COUNTRY_ID,:DEPARTMENT_NAME,:JOB_TITLE,:CITY,:STATE_PROVINCE,:COUNTRY_NAME,:REGION_NAME,:MANAGER_NAME) RETURNING EMPLOYEE_ID INTO :EMPLOYEE_ID;END;
